alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 2:15PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY RAIN MIXED WITH SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CLINTON... NORTHERN LYCOMING...AND TIOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy rain mixed with snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 213 PM EST, a band of heavy rain mixed with snow was along a line extending from near West Elmira to near Canton to 11 miles north of Jersey Shore and moving east at 60 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Mansfield, Morris, Blossburg, Lawrenceville, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Hyner, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Cammal, English Center, Trout Run, Buttonwood, Little Pine State Park, Tioga, Liberty, Roseville, Tioga Junction and Ski Sawmill Ski Area. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from Wellsboro to the Bradford county line. Route 15 from south of Trout Run to Lawrenceville. State Road 14 from Trout Run to the Bradford County line. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in changing weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
